caption.p: Quantification of ( a) glucose, ( b) fructose and ( c) sucrose. Statistical significance was tested by one-way ANOVA between control and treated and between one species against the other of the same condition. Letters represent statistical significance for ANOVA p < 0.05. n = 5. Error bars represent standard deviation. Abbreviations: Ctl, Control; Suc, Sucrose; Stl, Sorbitol.
